name: 'I Love Lucy' Trivia Quiz | I Love Lucy | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was Lucy arrested for in Paris?
options: Wearing a potato sack for a dress
questions.explanation:
Counterfeit money.

	This is when Lucy and Ricky have to go through about 5 people to translate the story to the police.

questions.text: What music star did the Ricardos and Mertzes meet on the way to Hollywood?
What type of store did Lucy and Ethel buy?
What did Lucy bring back from Europe and disguise it on the plane as a baby?
What did the Mertzes take the Ricardos to court for?
When the Ricardos went to Europe, by what mode of transportation did Lucy get to the ship?
Whose footprint did Lucy and Ethel steal while in Hollywood?
What Superhero did Lucy pretend to be for Little Ricky's birthday party?
What name did Lucy's mother always call Ricky?
Which of the Marx brothers did Lucy impersonate?
